question: Can you please tell me what do you do with the feets of the chickens,after when they are slaughtered.I am in the need of them so please help me?.
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
It is permissible to use the feet of the Chicken by cooking and eating them.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
